text: (he nabee!) aap jis dasha mein hon aur quraan mein se, jo kuchh bhee sunaate hon tatha (he manushyo!) tum log bhee koee karm nahin karate ho, parantu ham tumhen dekhate rahate hain, jab tum use karate ho aur (he nabee!) aapake paalanahaar se dharatee mein kan-bhar bhee koee cheez chhupee nahin rahatee aur na aakaash mein, na isase koee chhotee na badee, parantu vah khulee pustak mein ankit hai
